name: Keep It Together (Pedestrian Tactics)
description:
Your manager has left for a minute and a half. 

Move with WSAD or the arrows. 

Jump with the spacebar. 

Keep it together.



This game was inspired directly from a game that I built with a team at the 2021 Global Game Jam. A huge thanks to everyone on the team for helping inspire the idea.

Thanks Charles, Nick, Caleb, Griffin, Ian, and Kyle!

If you're on a Mac, please download this using the Itch app. Otherwise you'll get permissions errors.
